content: A building with high ceilings and huge rooms may be less practical than the colorless block of offices that takes its place, but it often fits in well with its surroundings.
translations: ita:Un edificio con soffitti alti e stanze enormi pu√≤ essere meno pratico del blocco incolore di uffici che prende il suo po
